AKS_Resiliency_Autoscaling.explanation: Autoscaling should be enabled for the nodepool. For more information, see https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/aks/cluster-autoscaler

AKS_Resiliency_AvailabilityZones.explanation: Availability zones should be enabled for the Node Pools. For more information, see https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/aks/availability-zones

AKS_Resiliency_MinNodesPerPool.explanation: For high availability, the minimum amount of nodes per pool should be 3.
